rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
哺乳动物感染病例上升为潜在的 H5N1 流感大流行敲响了警钟全面审查强调了 H5N1 禽流感在哺乳动物之间传播的增加趋势，强调需要进行警惕的监测，以防止潜在的大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Rising-mammal-infections-signal-alarm-for-潜在-H5N1-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Rising-mammal-infections-signal-alarm-for-pottial-H5N1-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=509204cd-3962-4328-9aac-74d0fa49a62c Wed, 14 Feb 2024 19:10:00 -0500 Rising mammal infections signal alarm for potential H5N1 pandemic
突破性模型提前数月预测心脏病发作风险研究引入了一种基于生物标志物的新型模型来预测即将发生的心肌梗死（IMI），识别出可能彻底改变早期检测和预防策略的关键蛋白质和代谢物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Groundwriting-model-predicts-heart-attack-risk-months-in-advance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Groundwriting-model-predicts-heart-attack-risk-months-in-advance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72cfd7e3-8db0-413e-98d3-e36075e01c06 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 18:49:00 -0500 Groundbreaking model predicts heart attack risk months in advance
研究显示吸烟、感染和体重指数会显着影响免疫反应研究揭示了吸烟、巨细胞病毒潜伏感染和体重指数如何显着影响细胞因子的释放，影响免疫反应的变异性并可能影响疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Smoking-infection-and-BMI-found-to-significantly-sway-immune-response-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Smoking-infection-and-BMI-found-to-significantly-sway-immune-response-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71831008-d19e-4bbc-885a-18809220fe8d Wed, 14 Feb 2024 18:21:00 -0500 Smoking, infection, and BMI found to significantly sway immune response, study shows
新研究揭示黑人孕妇对黑人产科护理人员的偏好美国疾病控制与预防中心的数据表明，美国黑人女性死于妊娠相关原因的可能性是白人女性的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-study-reveals-Black-pregnant-individuals-preference-for-Black-obstetric-care-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-study-reveals-Black-pregnant-individuals-preference-for-Black-obstetric-care-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98222f38-9c11-499b-b2e9-721c004dc991 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 14:25:00 -0500 New study reveals Black pregnant individuals' preference for Black obstetric care providers
研究揭示吸烟对免疫力的长期影响与年龄、性别和遗传等其他因素一样，吸烟对免疫反应也有重大影响。这是巴斯德研究所的一组科学家最近利用由 1,000 名健康志愿者组成的内部环境队列得出的结果，该队列旨在了解免疫反应的变异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-reveals-the-long-term-effects-of-smoking-on-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-reveals-the-long-term-effects-of-smoking-on-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb3ada00-3d99-464a-8dd3-d78822239164 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:44:43 -0500 Study reveals the long-term effects of smoking on immunity
磷酸化蛋白质组学分析揭示肿瘤中免疫细胞复杂的相互作用来自西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员与美国国立卫生研究院临床蛋白质组学肿瘤分析联盟、德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心、迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心合作，等人揭示了对癌症免疫反应的详细了解，标志着该领域的重大发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Phosphoproteomic-profiling-reveals-the-complex-interplay-of-immune-cells-in-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Phosphoproteomic-profiling-reveals-the-complex-interplay-of-immune-cells-in-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85090299-10f3-4c53-8ee2-44bf9670feb1 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:38:45 -0500 Phosphoproteomic profiling reveals the complex interplay of immune cells in tumors
突破性研究揭示电离辐射对细胞 DNA 的影响最近日本福岛核灾难排放的废水引发了人们对辐射暴露对健康影响的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-research-unveils-effects-of-ionizing-radiation-on-cellular-DNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-research-unveils-effects-of-ionizing-radiation-on-cellular-DNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca2ec3a-dde1-43eb-96a7-a871d95e9de0 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:46:00 -0500 Breakthrough research unveils effects of ionizing radiation on cellular DNA
抗菌漱口水可减少糖尿病患者的牙周炎细菌除了口臭之外，越来越多的证据表明，口腔持续炎症（如牙龈疾病）与阿尔茨海默病或 2 型糖尿病等严重疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Antiseptic-mouthwash-reduces-periodontitis-bacteria-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Antiseptic-mouthwash-reduces-periodontitis-bacteria-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76e6ce2c-7dc7-44bb-bad1-2475a6768a6e Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:29:10 -0500 Antiseptic mouthwash reduces periodontitis bacteria in diabetes patients
价值 2000 万美元的突破性 OCT 项目旨在彻底改变眼部健康筛查在美国，超过四分之一的 40 岁以上成年人患有眼部疾病，包括青光眼、白内障或年龄相关性黄斑变性，或影响眼睛的慢性健康状况，例如糖尿病性视网膜病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-2420-million-OCT-project-aims-to-revolutionize-eye-health-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Breakthrough-2420-million-OCT-project-aims-to-revolutionize-eye-health-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2f31847-80b8-4886-b0c9-9758dbc02ead Wed, 14 Feb 2024 11:17:32 -0500 Breakthrough $20 million OCT project aims to revolutionize eye health screening
研究揭示女性生殖因素与慢性阻塞性肺病风险之间的联系《Thorax》在线发表的研究发现，一系列生殖因素，包括月经初潮年龄和提前绝经，都与慢性阻塞性肺病（导致呼吸困难的进行性肺部疾病的总称）风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Research-uncovers-link- Between-reproductive-factors-and-COPD-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Research-uncovers-link- Between-reproductive-factors-and-COPD-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47e06490-9313-451e-a22b-ca5ccbf02374 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 11:12:37 -0500 Research uncovers link between reproductive factors and COPD risk in women
